price: 2. Kay maaluy yedderee kee kay xaylo Kaah xiqtem maliiy yallih digaalak tu kaak ma çatta.
arabic: مَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: mā aghnā ʿanhu māluhu wamā kasaba
